com.paypal.selion.testcomponents

Class BasicPageImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.testcomponents.AbstractPage
      • com.paypal.selion.testcomponents.BasicPageImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParentTraits, WebPage

    public abstract class BasicPageImpl
extends AbstractPage
implements ParentTraits
    A Base class from which all page classes should be derived. It contains the code to initialize pages, load values to the "ObjectMap", and interact in various ways with the page(s).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.paypal.selion.testcomponents.AbstractPage

    • Method Detail

      • loadObjectMap

        protected void loadObjectMap(HashMap<String,String> sourceMap)
        Load object map. This method takes a HashMap and uses it to populate the objectMap This is intended to allow for the use of programmatically generated locators in addition to the excel file format IDs and Locators
        Parameters:
        sourceMap - the source map

      • hasExpectedPageTitle

        public boolean hasExpectedPageTitle()
        Validates whether the actual current page title equals to expected page title.
        Returns:
        true if the actual page title is equal to any of the titles represented by this page object otherwise returns false

      • getPage

        public abstract BasicPageImpl getPage()
        Require extended class to provide this implementation.
        Specified by:
        getPage in interface WebPage
        Returns:
        the page

      • initializeHtmlObjects

        public void initializeHtmlObjects(Object whichClass,
                         Map<String,String> objectMap)
        This method is responsible for automatically initializing the PayPal HTML Objects with their corresponding key values obtained from the hash map.
        Parameters:
        whichClass - Indicate for what object you want the initialization to be done for e.g., the GUI Page class name such as PayPalLoginPage, PayPalAddBankPage, etc
        objectMap - Pass the Map that contains the key, value pairs read from the yaml file or excel sheet

      • isCurrentPageInBrowser

        public boolean isCurrentPageInBrowser()
        Verify's if the current page is opened in the browser. It does this based on the pageValidators.
        Specified by:
